title: Council Decision of 27 February 1998 repealing Common Position 97/625/CFSP, defined by the Council on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union, on restrictive measures to be taken against persons in Bosnia and Herzegovina acting against the peace agreements
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 27 February 1998 repealing Common Position 97/625/CFSP, defined by the Council on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union, on restrictive measures to be taken against persons in Bosnia and Herzegovina acting against the peace agreements (98/196/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Member States shall take all measures necessary to give effect to Article 1 as from the date of the adoption of this Decision.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 February 1998.
For the Council
The President
G. BROWN
(1) OJ L 259, 22.9.1997, p. 1.
